title: Bug 31627DBCS: Perspective change caused core dump after adding DBCS project to the workspace
description:
Language: Japanese
Build driver: eclipseSDKI20030211linuxgtk
OS: RedHat8 (Japanese: locale jaJP.eucJP), gtk 2.2
JDK Ver.: IBM JDK1.3.1 + SR3
Summary: DBCS: Perspective change caused core dump after adding DBCS project to the workspace
OB: After adding a DBCS project to the workspace, when I click the 'Resource Perspective' icon at the shortcut bar, the workbench crashes and results in a core dump.
EB: I expect that clicking the 'Resource Perspective' icon should change the perspective successfully without causing a core dump.
SR:
Steps to reproduce the problem:
1. Add a DBCS project to the workspace.
2. Click the 'Resource Perspective' icon at the shortcut bar.
